language.name: 简体中文
incendium.advancement.root.title: Incendium
incendium.advancement.root.desc: 探索Incendium的下界——一个骇人又遍布机遇的地方
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.roo: 感受炼狱沙丘的火辣热气
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.dun: 杀死一个栖息在炼狱沙丘的沙漠烈焰人
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.bor: 在光与暗的交界处杀死一个沙漠烈焰人，并借此同时获取两地的掉落物
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.inf: 在祭坛处献祭一个下界之星以召唤炼狱游者
杀死炼狱是不可能的，活下去就算胜利
在炼狱的最后一个魔咒下活下来，并领取你的奖励
在没有护甲的情况下活过炼狱的最终阶段
在锻造台使用炼狱翎毛升级鞘翅
incendium.advancement.ash_barrens.root.d: 进入灰尘荒地，这片被遗忘的土地便是禁堡的坐落处
incendium.advancement.ash_barrens.enter_: 在黄金年代，一位伟大的雄主掌控着这座城堡。但在一系列的背叛与诅咒之后，他被自己的王国所放逐。如今剩下来的只有这些。
incendium.advancement.ash_barrens.conque: 强攻禁堡并杀死每一个在此居住的猪灵
incendium.advancement.volcanic_deltas.ro: 进入地势混乱的三角洲火山
incendium.advancement.volcanic_deltas.hi: 在三角洲火山的高处开采暴露的远古残骸
小心石英平地，那儿是个美丽但危险的地方
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.floor: 到了平地，更要当心那里的熔岩冻海
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.ghast: 在恶魂的主场——熔岩冻海之上，杀掉一个恶魂
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.rescu: 进入囚禁小恶灵的石英塔
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.feed_: 给小恶灵喂食它最喜爱的怪异食品 - 火焰弹 - 使它开始跟随你
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.torte: 杀死大厨Torte并搜刮他的厨房
找到隐藏于石英厨房的宝藏
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.sanct: 灾厄村民的圣所恐怕并没有看上去那么神圣...
incendium.advancement.withered_forest.ro: 进入枯焦森林，猪灵与凋零骷髅的古老战场
incendium.advancement.withered_forest.ch: 穿上锁链甲并在其庇佑下驱散一个不瞑亡魂
incendium.advancement.misc.ruined_lab.de: 猪灵主持的那场事与愿违的实验导致了如今的危险局面
incendium.advancement.toxic_heap.root.de: 进入被称之为毒料堆的核废土
incendium.advancement.toxic_heap.slime_p: 染上剧毒史莱姆的毒素
incendium.advancement.toxic_heap.mystic_: 搜集所有可能在发电站中出现的战利品
incendium.advancement.misc.root.title: 怪异群落
incendium.advancement.misc.loot_piglin_v: 从猪灵村庄那盗走一点战利品
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.pip: 进入管道，不过要当心危险的烈焰人哨卫
被哨卫的闪电攻击击中
拿到管道中的隐秘宝藏
incendium.item.firestorm.name: 火尘暴
incendium.item.firestorm.desc1: 使射出的光灵箭转变成强大的闪电攻击
incendium.item.lunacy_torch.name: 痴愚火炬
incendium.item.lunacy_torch.desc1: 在物品栏中会释放出会使烈焰人
incendium.item.necrotic_shield.name: 骨疽护盾
incendium.item.necrotic_shield.desc1: 格挡攻击后引发死亡爆炸
incendium.item.prismatic_shield.name: 光棱护盾
incendium.item.prismatic_shield.desc1: 格挡攻击后释放强力光束
incendium.item.radiation_shield.name: 辐射护盾
incendium.item.infernal_wings.name: 炼狱之翼
incendium.item.infernal_wings.desc1: 将炼狱游者的护盾碎片
incendium.item.infernal_wings.desc2: 进一步锻造成的装甲羽翼
incendium.item.infernal_feather.name: 炼狱翎毛
incendium.item.infernal_feather.desc1: 用炼狱游者的护盾残余
incendium.item.ghastling_egg.name: 小恶灵
incendium.item.ghastling_egg.desc1: 拦截其能见看见的恶魂火球
incendium.item.ghastling_egg.desc3: 忠实又有点懒洋洋的家伙
incendium.item.chilling_blade.name: 激寒之刃
incendium.item.blazing_hatchet.name: 烈焰短斧
incendium.item.multiplex.name: 窝蜂弩
incendium.item.hefty_pickaxe.name: 有力重镐
incendium.item.hefty_pickaxe.desc1: 面向下界设计的开凿工具
incendium.item.greatsword.name: 牺牲巨剑
incendium.item.greatsword.desc1: 以持有者的生命力为代价
incendium.item.sentrys_wrath.name: 哨卫之怒
incendium.item.sentrys_wrath.desc1: 使射出的光灵箭转而拥有缓慢
incendium.item.voltaic_trident.name: 流电三叉戟
incendium.item.voltaic_trident.system.un: struggles to be stable with the channeling enchantment
incendium.item.unstable_powder.name: 不稳定粉末
incendium.item.unstable_powder.desc1: 掉到地上时会释放出放出暴露一切的光亮
incendium.item.scarlet_dagger.name: 腥红匕首
incendium.item.scarlet_dagger.desc1: 从击杀目标身上吸取生命
incendium.item.withersbane.name: 凋灵克星
incendium.item.withersbane.desc1: 古老的利刃，用于打击来自下界的不洁力量
incendium.item.daybreaker.name: 破晓者
incendium.item.daybreaker.desc1: 任意生物都将有概率掉落黄金
incendium.item.holy_wrath.name: 神圣暴怒
incendium.item.holy_wrath.desc1: 生成由火球构成的螺旋
incendium.item.battle_helm.name: 侦察兵的战盔
incendium.item.battle_helm.desc1: 你大可以选择躲藏，但你终究逃不过@TheDancyScout
incendium.item.warping_witherblade.name: 扭曲的凋灵克星
incendium.item.warping_witherblade.desc1: For in life all things return
incendium.item.warping_witherblade.desc2: to death, and in death all things
incendium.item.trailblazer.name: Trailblazer
incendium.item.trailblazer.desc2: the longer you pull the bow.
incendium.item.trailblazer.system.fail: requires a fully drawn back bow to function
incendium.item.trailblazer.system.wet: has become wet. You must dry it off before using it again
incendium.item.trailblazer.system.still_: is still wet and cannot function
incendium.item.ragnarok.name: Ragnarok
incendium.item.ragnarok.desc1: The longer you hold back the bow,
incendium.item.ragnarok.desc2: the more powerful the lightning you create
incendium.item.ragnarok.system.unstable: is becoming unstable the longer you hold it's power within
incendium.item.ragnarok.system.storm: is becoming more unstable during the storm
incendium.item.hazmat.helmet.name: Hazmat Helmet
incendium.item.hazmat.chestplate.name: Hazmat Chestplate
incendium.item.hazmat.leggings.name: Hazmat Leggings
incendium.item.hazmat.boots.name: Hazmat Boots
incendium.item.returning_scroll.name: Scroll of Returning
incendium.item.returning_scroll.system.w: The ancient technique withstood itself, this time...
incendium.item.returning_scroll.system.c: The ancient technique crumbled upon usage
incendium.item.returning_scroll.system.f: The Scroll of Returning only understands the Nether dimension!
incendium.item.restless_nature.name: Restless Nature
incendium.item.restless_nature.desc2: with a final wish to regrow
incendium.item.restless_nature.desc3: the lost nature of the Nether
incendium.item.cake.name: Cake Batter
incendium.item.cake.system.ache: You've eaten too much cake and received a stomach ache
incendium.item.suspicious_brew.name: Suspicious Brew
incendium.item.miners_ale.name: Miner's Ale
incendium.item.undying_elixer.name: Elixir of Undying
incendium.item.death_pot.name: Death Potion
incendium.item.death_pot.desc2: Drink the brew, and bide the danger,
incendium.item.death_pot.desc3: Or wonder till it drives you mad;
incendium.item.death_pot.desc4: What would have happened if you had?
incendium.item.piglin_slayer.name: Piglin Slayer
incendium.item.misc.key.name: Key
incendium.item.misc.feed.name: Ghastling Feed
incendium.item.misc.todo.name: Feed once a week
incendium.system.shatter: has shattered after being used on a Grindstone
incendium.system.nbs.uninstall2: has uninstalled successfully. You may now remove it from your datapack folder.

incendium.inferno.system.fail.normal: faces no challengers and now lays rest
